articles.author: Shishir Gupta
articles.title: China targets Lithuania over Taiwan, hits global supply chains - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Chinese import sanction on tiny Lithuania is a veiled threat to other members of the European Union (EU) not to question Beijing. Fact is that the Xi Jinping regime is targeting global supply chains to punish a small country. | World News
articles.content: With China blocking imports from tiny Lithuania including those with Lithuanian parts as retaliation for allowing Taiwan to open a representative office in Vilnius, the Middle Kingdoms wolf warrior d… [+3034 chars]

articles.title: O2 rules out return of European roaming charges despite Brexit - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Virgin Media O2 is poised to become the only network not to bring back the charges in a move that will pile pressure onto its rivals
articles.content:
Virgin Media O2 has refused to bring back European roaming charges post-Brexit in a move that will heap pressure on its rivals to scrap their fees.
The newly-combined company is poised to become the… [+1661 chars]
